name: Introduction to Classical Mechanics
author: Dr. Albert Newton
description: Learn the fundamentals of classical mechanics, including Newton's laws and motion.

name: Organic Chemistry: Hydrocarbons
author: Prof. Sarah Johnson
description: An in-depth tutorial on the properties and reactions of hydrocarbons in organic chemistry.

name: Basic Spanish: Beginner Level
author: Carlos Garcia
description: A beginner-level Spanish tutorial covering basic vocabulary, greetings, and sentence structure.

name: Introduction to Genetics
author: Dr. Emily Watson
description: Understand the basics of genetics, including inheritance, DNA structure, and gene expression.

name: Basic French Conversation
author: Marie Dubois
description: Improve your French through simple conversation practices, ideal for beginners.

name: Physics of Electromagnetism
author: Dr. Maxwell Faraday
description: Dive deep into the principles of electromagnetism, covering electric fields, magnetic fields, and waves.

name: Introductory Mandarin for Beginners
author: Ling Zhang
description: Learn the basics of Mandarin Chinese, including common phrases and basic grammar.

name: Environmental Science: Ecosystems and Biodiversity
author: Dr. Laura Green
description: Explore the importance of ecosystems and biodiversity in this detailed environmental science tutorial.

name: Advanced Physics: Quantum Mechanics
author: Dr. Richard Feynman
description: A deep dive into quantum mechanics, including wave functions, uncertainty principle, and quantum entanglement.
